Types

Case = enum
  Default = "DEFAULT", Camel = "CAMEL", Kebab = "KEBAB", Lower = "LOWER", Pascal = "PASCAL",
  Snake = "SNAKE", Upper = "UPPER"
Supported case types.   Source Edit

proc find(str: string; open: char; close: char; toFind: string): seq[int] {...}{.raises: [],
    tags: [].}
Find location of toFind in str when the open and close character count is the same

Examples:

doAssert find("<A,B>,B", '<', '>', ",") == @[5]
doAssert find("A,<B,C>", '<', '>', ",") == @[1]
  Source Edit 
proc split(str: string; open: char; close: char; separator: string): seq[string] {...}{.
    raises: [], tags: [].}
Split string into a sequence of string based on the given info from find .

Examples:

doAssert split("<A,B>,B", '<', '>', ",") == @["<A,B>", "B"]
doAssert split("<A, <B, C>>, <A, <B, C>>, <X, Y>", '<', '>', ", ") ==
    @["<A, <B, C>>", "<A, <B, C>>", "<X, Y>"]
  Source Edit
